SEARCH
Package complexClasses

Class ComplexMatrix

java.lang.Object
complexClasses.ComplexObject
complexClasses.ComplexMatrix
public class ComplexMatrix extends ComplexObject
This class represents a matrix of complex numbers and supports basic matrix operations.

A ComplexMatrix object can be constructed using its dimensions or from an existing two-dimensional array of ComplexNumber objects. It supports matrix multiplication and basic getter and setter operations.

This class assumes matrices are rectangular (all rows have the same number of columns).

Since:
25 June 2024
Version:
0.1
Author:
Robert Smith

      public ComplexMatrix(int rows, int cols)
      Constructs an empty matrix of given dimensions filled with zero complex numbers.

      cols - The number of columns in the matrix.

    • ComplexMatrix

      public ComplexMatrix(ComplexNumber[][] data)
      Constructs a matrix from a two-dimensional array of complex numbers.

      The dimensions of the matrix are determined from the array.

      Parameters:
      data - The two-dimensional array of complex numbers representing the matrix.
